TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WebPartPersonalization extends System.Object

summary.span: 实现低级别个性化设置操作。

span.span: Implements low-level personalization operations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类实现所需执行较低级别个性化设置操作的逻辑。This class implements the logic required to carry out lower-level personalization operations. 尽管类管理高级生命周期的个性化设置，它是负责实际实施物理的步骤执行特定的个性化设置操作所需的类。Although the class manages the high-level life cycle of personalization, it is the class that is responsible for actually implementing the physical steps necessary to carry out specific personalization actions. 类的实现上又依赖于与个性化设置信息的基础数据存储进行通信。The class in turn relies on an implementation of to communicate with the underlying data store for personalization information. 如果使用的默认实现，它创建的实例类，可通过引用属性。If you use the default implementation of the , it creates an instance of the class that you can use by referencing the property. 例如，若要访问属性，则会指定`WebPartManager.Personalization.InitialScope`。For example, to access the property, you would specify `WebPartManager.Personalization.InitialScope`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将使用类，并提供个性化设置范围是如何影响结果的个性化设置属性的示例。The following code example shows how the class is used, as well as providing an example of how personalization scope affects the results of personalized properties. 此示例中有五个文件：This example has five files: - 一个.aspx 页面，以声明方式创建两个 Web 部件区域，每个都有一个控件。An .aspx page that declaratively creates two Web Part zones, each with a control. - 用户控件名为`Color.ascx`，允许用户应用基于用户的授权权限修改状态信息和输入共享的范围的文本背景色的个性化的属性进行更改。A user control called `Color.ascx` that allows a user to change a personalized property that applies a text box background color based on the user's authorization rights to modify state information and to enter shared scope. - 用户控件名为`Persmode.ascx`，该值指示当前的页范围是和何种权限当前用户具有的输入共享作用域或修改数据; 它还提供了两个按钮; 一个用于更改作用域，另一个用于重置当前的用户个性化设置信息。A user control called `Persmode.ascx` that indicates what the current page scope is and what rights the current user has to enter shared scope or to modify data; it also provides two buttons; one to change scope and one to reset current user personalization information. - Login 控件，用于为用户授权。A login control that is used to authorize users. - 包含一个部分，其中提供了授权用户修改个性化设置状态，并输入共享作用域的一个示例的 Web.config 文件。A Web.config file with a section that provides an example of authorizing a user to modify personalization state and to enter shared scope. 以下代码将创建包含链接的 aspx 页和两个 Web 部件区域中并显示`Color.ascx`和`Persmode.ascx`控件。The following code creates an aspx page with a and two Web Part zones and displays the `Color.ascx` and `Persmode.ascx` controls. 页面加载登录页面，用于获取当前用户信息。The page loads a login page that is used to get the current user information. 使用 ASP.NET 网站管理工具中[!INCLUDE[vsprvsext](~/includes/vsprvsext-md.md)]可创建用户以访问相应页面。Use the ASP.NET Web Site Administration Tool in [!INCLUDE[vsprvsext](~/includes/vsprvsext-md.md)] to create users to access the page. 请参阅授予配置文件中的授权的用户可以更改作用域和修改状态信息的示例的 Web.config 文件。See the Web.config file for an example of a user granted authorization in the configuration file to change scope and modify state information. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartPersonalization#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartPersonalization/CS/Defaultcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartPersonalization#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartPersonalization/VB/Defaultvb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例创建一个登录页面。The following example code creates a login page. 在成功登录后它将重定向到主 aspx 页。After a successful login, it redirects to the main aspx page. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartPersonalization#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartPersonalization/CS/login.aspx#5)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartPersonalization#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartPersonalization/VB/login.aspx#5)] 下面的示例代码是此应用程序的 Web.config 文件的一部分。The following example code is a portion of the Web.config file for this application. 本部分介绍如何在此情况下"user2"设置为用户授权中，输入共享个性化设置范围以及如何修改个性化设置状态信息。This section shows how to set authorization for a user, in this case "user2", to enter shared personalization scope and to modify personalization state information. 它还显示在此情况下"admin"，可用于允许输入共享个性化设置范围和修改个性化设置状态信息的"管理员"角色中的用户的角色的一个示例。It also shows an example of a role, in this case "admin", that can be used to allow users in the "admin" role to enter shared personalization scope and to modify personalization state information. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartPersonalization#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartPersonalization/CS/web.config#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartPersonalization#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartPersonalization/VB/web.config#2)] 下面的代码示例创建一个用户控件，名为`Color.ascx`，允许用户更改的个性化设置的属性，在此情况下两个文本框中，基于当前个性化设置范围和用户的授权权限的背景色.The following example code creates a user control, called `Color.ascx`, that allows the user to change a personalized property, in this case the background color of two text boxes, based on the current personalization scope and the authorization rights of the user. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartPersonalization#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartPersonalization/CS/color.ascx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartPersonalization#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartPersonalization/VB/color.ascx#3)] 下面的代码示例创建一个用户控件，名为`Persmode.ascx`、 显示当前个性化设置范围和用户权限以修改状态和输入共享作用域。The following example code creates a user control, called `Persmode.ascx`, that shows the current personalization scope and the user rights to modify state and to enter shared scope. 它还具有用于重置当前个性化设置状态的重置按钮。It also has a reset button for resetting the current personalization state. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartPersonalization#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartPersonalization/CS/persMode.ascx#4)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartPersonalization#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartPersonalization/VB/persMode.ascx#4)]

para.span: 类与紧密合作控制和个性化设置基础结构的其余部分。

span.span: The class works closely with a control and the rest of the personalization infrastructure.

para.span: 个性化设置的默认实现是非常可靠的子系统，应能满足你的个性化设置需求。

span.span: The default implementation of personalization is a very robust subsystem that should meet your personalization needs.

para.span: 在大多数情况下，如果你想要自定义个性化设置，您可以创建使用的数据提供程序的个性化设置提供程序通过创建一个类继承自。

span.span: In most cases, if you want to customize personalization, you can create a data provider for use as a personalization provider by creating a class that inherits from .

para.span: 如果你想要创建明显不同于由提供的个性化设置子系统和类，应创建自定义通过派生自实现并添加自己的自定义逻辑。

span.span: If you want to create a personalization subsystem significantly different from that provided by the and the classes, you should create a custom implementation by deriving from and add your own custom logic.

para.span: 然后创建自定义通过派生自实现，添加您自己的自定义逻辑，并覆盖方法以返回您的自定义实现。

span.span: Then create a custom implementation by deriving from , add your own custom logic, and override the method to return your custom implementation.

para.span: 因为控件的个性化设置基础结构通过向发出请求实例，控件不会不直接与之交互或具有对引用实现。

span.span: Because a control makes requests to the personalization infrastructure by way of a instance, the control does not directly interact with or hold references to implementations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法更改为指定的新作用域的当前正在执行的页的个性化设置范围`newScope`参数。This method changes the currently executing page's personalization scope to the new scope specified by the `newScope` parameter. 此方法是调用由公共受保护的帮助器方法方法。This method is the protected helper method that is called by the public method. 此受保护的方法存在是为了处理将来的扩展，如果有两个以上的可能范围之间进行切换。This protected method exists to handle future extensibility if there are more than two possible scopes to switch between. 如果当前范围和`newScope`都是相同的值，则此方法会不执行任何操作。If the current scope and `newScope` are the same value, then this method performs no operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法提取个性化设置状态从`webPartA`并将其应用于`webPartB`。This method extracts the personalization state from `webPartA` and applies it to `webPartB`. 此方法假设`webPartA`和`webPartB`属于同一类型。This method assumes that `webPartA` and `webPartB` are the same type. 如果 Web 部件控件控件，该方法的个性化设置状态将从复制中包装的子控件`webPartA`给子控件包装在`webPartB`。If the Web Parts controls are controls, the method copies the personalization state from the child control wrapped in `webPartA` to the child control wrapped in `webPartB`. 作为复制操作的一部分`webPartB`标记为"脏"。As part of the copy operation, `webPartB` is marked as "dirty".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性指示是否请求个性化设置为父级启用控件。This property indicates whether personalization is requested to be enabled for the parent control. 请注意，这是从的意图细微但重要的区别和。Note that this is a subtle but important distinction from the intent of and . 仅在完成之前设置此属性控件的方法。This property can only be set prior to the completion of the control's method. 在实践中，这意味着属性必须在页面标记中设置元素是否应该禁用个性化设置。In practice, this means that the property must be set in the page markup on the element if personalization should be disabled. 或者，可以将此属性设置期间`PreInit`阶段控件。Alternatively, this property can be set during the `PreInit` phase of the control.

param.name: ensureModifiable
param.span: 布尔值，指示应进行哪种类型的检查。

span.span: A Boolean value indicating which type of check should be made.

summary.span: 确保 实例已完成初始化或当前用户具有修改个性化设置状态的权限。

span.span: Ensures that the instance has completed initialization or that the current user has rights to modify personalization state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法是使用在多个帮助器方法方法，以确保两个条件之一：This method is a helper method used in several methods to ensure one of two things: - 实例已完成初始化 (例如，方法已调用并成功完成)。The instance has completed initialization (for example, the method was called and successfully completed). 如果进行此检查`ensureModifiable`参数等于`false`。This check is made if the `ensureModifiable` parameter equals `false`. \- 或 -\- or - - 当前用户有权修改个性化设置状态。The current user has rights to modify personalization state. 如果进行此检查`ensureModifiable`等于`true`。This check is made if `ensureModifiable` equals `true`. 控件还会在许多情况下调用此方法：The control also calls this method in a number of cases: - 若要切换到正常以外的内容的显示模式。To switch the display mode to something other than normal. 当前用户必须有权修改个性化设置状态。The current user must have rights to modify personalization state. - 若要添加、 删除或移动 Web 部件控件。To add, delete, or move Web Parts controls. 当前用户必须有权修改个性化设置状态。The current user must have rights to modify personalization state. - 若要连接，断开连接，并编辑 Web 部件控件。To connect, disconnect, and edit Web Parts controls. 当前用户必须有权修改个性化设置状态。The current user must have rights to modify personalization state. - 若要导出 Web 部件控件在页面上。To export the Web Parts controls on a page. 实例必须已完成初始化。The instance must have completed initialization. - 若要导入 Web 部件控件。To import Web Parts controls. 当前用户必须有权修改个性化设置状态。The current user must have rights to modify personalization state.

exception.span: 当前用户不具有修改个性化设置信息的权限，或其他检查失败。

span.span: The current user does not have rights to modify personalization information, or other checks failed.
\- or -

exception.span: 返回 。

span.span: returned .

summary.span: 初始化个性化设置。

span.span: Initializes personalization.
A instance for the parent .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这是初始化代表父级的个性化设置信息的主入口点控件。This is the main entry point for initializing personalization information on behalf of the parent control. 此方法调用期间父控件的方法。This method is called during the parent control's method. 通常情况下，如果个性化设置已被禁用的父控件，将永远不会调用此方法。Normally, if personalization has been disabled on the parent control, this method will never be called. 在此方法的课程中，会发生以下初始化：During the course of this method, the following initializations occur: - 对默认个性化设置提供程序或自定义提供程序的引用所示页面标记或获取属性。A reference to either the default personalization provider, or the custom provider indicated in the page markup or the property, is obtained. - 提供程序调用以确定用户功能 () 当前正在执行的用户。The provider is called to determine the user capabilities () for the currently executing user. - 当前作用域用户/页/组合的个性化设置状态提供程序，从基础数据存储区加载 () 并存储在实例。The personalization state for the current page/user/scope combination is loaded from the underlying data store by the provider () and stored within the instance. - 提供商确定当前的页/用户/范围的个性化设置范围 ()。The personalization scope for the current page/user/scope is determined by the provider (). 请注意，此决定的结果可能是不同的值属性。Note that the result of this determination might be different than the value of the property. 此方法返回的作用域值用作值属性。The scope value returned from this method is used as the value for the property. > [!NOTE] > 才会出现由于个性化设置未启用异常直接调用方法。An exception due to personalization not being enabled will occur only if the method is called directly. 在 ASP.NET 实现中，实际上调用内部帮助器方法执行加载，并且此帮助器方法以无提示方式返回如果尚未启用个性化设置页。In the ASP.NET implementation, an internal helper method is actually called to perform the load, and this helper method silently returns if personalization has not been enabled for the page.

exception.span: 如果个性化设置未启用（ 等于 ），则调用此方法。

span.span: This method is called when personalization is not enabled ( equals ).
\- or -

\- or -

span.span: The object containing the personalization state data is .

exception.span: 加载和反序列化数据时出现问题。

span.span: A problem occurred while loading and deserializing data.
\- or -

exception.span: 配置文件中的个性化设置提供程序的定义出现错误。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性返回此属性在页声明中设置的值。This property returns the value set for this property in the page declaration. 如果未设置此属性，它将返回。If this property was not set, it returns . 在这种情况下，网页将使用配置文件中指定的默认个性化设置提供程序。In this case, the page uses the default personalization provider specified in the configuration file. 仅在完成之前设置此属性控件的方法。This property can only be set prior to the completion of the control's method. 这意味着属性必须在设置页声明中元素。This means the property must be set in the page declaration on the element. 或者，可以将此属性设置期间`PreInit`阶段。Alternatively, this property can be set during the `PreInit` phase.

summary.span: 在基础数据存储区中重置当前的页、范围和用户的个性化设置数据。

span.span: Resets personalization data for the current page, scope, and user in the underlying data store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将重置当前页、 范围和基础数据存储区中的用户的个性化设置数据。This method resets personalization data for the current page, scope, and user in the underlying data store. 重置操作的副作用，当前正在执行的页重新执行通过调用。As a side effect of the reset, the currently executing page is re-executed by a call. 请注意，此传输重新执行当前页为`GET`请求而不考虑与该页最初请求的方式。Note that this transfer re-executes the current page as a `GET` request regardless of how the page was originally requested. 可以在任何时候调用此方法。This method can be called at any time. 在内部，此方法调用的提供程序的方法。Internally, this method calls the method on the provider. 已成功重置数据后，属性设置为`true`。After data is successfully reset, the property is set to `true`. 通过在其他地方使用此属性实例绕过从控件属性的个性化设置数据提取，并将其保存，如果已重置数据。This property is used elsewhere by the instance to bypass extracting personalization data from control properties and saving it if data has already been reset.

span.span: The instance cannot reference a valid personalization provider.

span.span: Saves personalization data for the current page, scope, and user to the underlying data store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法调用期间控件的事件。This method is called during the control's event. 在内部，方法调用的提供程序的方法。Internally, the method calls the method on the provider. 尝试保存个性化设置数据，如果当前正在执行用户不具有名为的功能(在当前实例) 会导致异常。Attempting to save personalization data when the currently executing user does not have the capability called (within the current instance) results in an exception. 请注意，这才是 true 如果控件调用受保护直接方法。Note that this would only be true if the control called the protected method directly. 在 ASP.NET 实现中，实际上调用内部帮助器方法来执行保存，并且此帮助器方法以无提示方式返回如果当前正在执行的用户没有权限修改数据。In the ASP.NET implementation, an internal helper method is actually called to perform the save, and this helper method silently returns if the currently executing user does not have rights to modify data.

summary.span: 将父 控件标记为具有已更改的个性化数据（即“脏数据”）。

span.span: Marks the parent control as having personalization data that has changed (is "dirty").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果属性设置为`true`，此方法将父标记控制为"脏"。If the property is set to `true`, this method marks the parent control as "dirty". 具体取决于的实现细节控件的实例的，此方法可能调用安全检查和代码访问安全权限检查。Depending on the implementation details of the control's instance of , this method might invoke security checks and code access security permission checks. 在内部，此方法调用方法。Internally, this method calls the method. 请注意，控件在内部跟踪"更新"状态，并公开通过管理器的"更新"属性而不是通过此方法。Note that the control tracks "dirty" state internally and exposes the "dirtiness" of the manager through the property rather than through this method.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示当前页的个性化设置数据是否已重置（例如，已请求从基础数据存储区删除个性化设置数据）。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the personalization data of the current page has been reset (for example, a request was made to delete the personalization data from the underlying data store).

value.span: 如果当前页的个性化设置状态已重置，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the personalization state for the current page has been reset; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此属性设置为`true`，它指示当前页的个性化设置状态已被重置并提取个性化设置数据控件以及后续保存操作应跳过。If this property is set to `true`, it indicates that the personalization state for the current page has been reset and that extraction of personalization data from controls and subsequent save operations should be skipped. 目前，此属性自动设置为`true`个性化设置基础结构如果调用方法。Currently, this property is automatically set to `true` by the personalization infrastructure if the method is called. 请注意，尽管当此属性可以设置任何限制，但必须将属性设置为`true`之前控件的事件以产生任何影响。Note that although there are no restrictions on when this property can be set, the property must be set to `true` prior to the control's event to have any effect.

summary.span: 将当前页的个性化设置范围从 切换到 ，或从 切换到 。

span.span: Switches the current page's personalization scope from to or from to .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法切换当前正在执行的页的个性化设置范围。This method toggles the currently executing page's personalization scope. 切换范围会导致回当前正在执行的页。Toggling the scope results in a back to the current executing page. 如果调用时导出或导入 Web 部件控件的发生，则此方法执行任何操作。This method performs no operation if it is called while an export or import of a Web Parts control is occurring. 如果切换范围请求用于通过已提交的页面会发生`POST`请求，则所有查询字符串值将保留在传输过程; 如果通过已提交页面不保留查询字符串参数`GET`请求。If a toggle scope request occurs for a page that was submitted via a `POST` request, then any query string values will be preserved during the transfer; query string parameters are not preserved if the page was submitted via a `GET` request. ## Examples 下面的代码演示了如何使用方法。The following code demonstrates using the method. 此代码中找到更大的代码示例摘自类说明。This code is part of a larger code sample found in the class description. remarks.format: ## Remarks 目前类包含两个值，该值指示用户的功能：`modifyState`和`enterSharedScope`。Currently the class contains two values indicating a user's capabilities: `modifyState` and `enterSharedScope`. 为了方便使用，可以使用的帮助程序属性检查字典中包含的功能和。For ease of use, the capabilities contained within the dictionary can be checked with the helper properties and . 请注意对访问这些属性; 后更改功能的限制有关详细信息，请参阅每个属性的描述部分。Note the restrictions on changing capabilities after either of these properties have been accessed; for details, see the description section of each property.
